query.sql: select SS.*, T.TASK from ( select YYY.* ,dw_bib_etl_utl.dw_clean_to_number(fn_extract_4rm_string (REP_V ,' ',1)) DW_RUN_ID ,dw_bib_etl_utl.dw_clean_to_number(fn_extract_4rm_string (REP_V ,' ',2)) DW_TASK_ID ,dw_bib_etl_utl.dw_clean_to_number(fn_extract_4rm_string (REP_V ,' ',3)) DW_RANGE_VALUE_ID from ( select XXX.* , replace(replace(replace(replace (client_info,'DW_RUN_ID=',''),' and DW_TASK_ID=',' '),' and DW_RV=',' '),'PV=',' ') REP_V from (select module,max(case when s.event not like 'PX%' then s.event else '' end) mx_event ,max(trunc((sysdate- s.SQL_EXEC_START)*24*60,2)) Mins_Exec ,max(trunc((sysdate-s.logon_time)*24*60,2)) Mins_Logon ,max(case when s.event not like '%PX%' then s.seconds_in_wait else 0 end) seconds_in_wait ,max(s.SQL_ID) SQL_ID , max(inst_id) mx_s, min(inst_id) mn_s, count(*) c_ses, count(distinct inst_id) nds ,max(s.osuser) osuser,max(s.schemaname) schemaname,max(s.username) username,max(s.machine) machine,min(s.logon_time) login_time ,s.client_info,s.action ,max(s.sql_hash_value) sql_hash_value from gv$session s /*left outer join gv$sqltext t on ( t.hash_value = s.sql_hash_value and t.inst_id=s.inst_id) */ where 1=1 --and s.type!='BACKGROUND' and (:MODULE_LIKE is null or module like '%'||:MODULE_LIKE ||'%') and (:RUN_LIKE is null or client_info like '%'||:RUN_LIKE ||'%') and (:ACTION_LIKE is null or action like '%'||:ACTION_LIKE ||'%') and (:MODULE_NOT_LIKE is null or module not like '%'||:MODULE_NOT_LIKE ||'%') and (client_info like '%DW_%') --and s.status='ACTIVE' and s.sql_id is not null /*and nvl(t.piece,0)<1 */ group by s.client_info,s.action,module ) XXX order by mins_logon desc nulls last, mins_logon desc nulls last ) YYY ) SS left join dw_tasks T on SS.DW_TASK_ID=T.DW_TASK_ID where (:TASK_LIKE is null or nvl(T.TASK,'_') like :TASK_LIKE)

SELECT RPAD('Inst: '||v.inst_id, 9)||' '||RPAD('Child: '||v.child_number, 11) inst_child, t.plan_table_output FROM gv$sql v, TABLE(DBMS_XPLAN.DISPLAY('gv$sql_plan_statistics_all', NULL, 'ADVANCED ALLSTATS LAST', 'inst_id = '||v.inst_id||' AND sql_id = '''||v.sql_id||''' AND child_number = '||v.child_number)) t WHERE /*v.sql_id = :SQL_ID*/ exists (select 1 from gv$session gs where v.sql_id=gs.sql_id and v.inst_id=gs.inst_id and client_info=:CLIENT_INFO )
AND v.loaded_versions > 0 -- order by inst_id,sql_id

WITH XXX as (select /*+ MATERIALIZE */ distinct sql_hash_value,inst_id from gv$session gs where client_info=:CLIENT_INFO and module=:MODULE ) select * from gv$sqltext v where exists (select 1 from XXX where v.hash_value=XXX.sql_hash_value and v.inst_id=XXX.inst_id )
/*hash_value = :SQL_HASH_VALUE --and inst_id=:INST_ID*/ order by inst_id,piece

select O_CONS_GRP,C_CONS_GRP,rs.* from gv$rsrc_session_info rs join gv$session a on (rs.inst_id=a.inst_id and rs.sid=a.sid) left outer join (select CONSUMER_GROUP_ID O_gid, CONSUMER_GROUP O_CONS_GRP from dba_rsrc_consumer_groups) o_gr on (rs.ORIG_CONSUMER_GROUP_ID=O_gid) left outer join (select CONSUMER_GROUP_ID C_gid, CONSUMER_GROUP C_CONS_GRP from dba_rsrc_consumer_groups) c_gr on (rs.CURRENT_CONSUMER_GROUP_ID=C_gid) where a.module =:MODULE and a.client_info =:CLIENT_INFO

select * from ( select s.action, case when message like 'Insert%' or message like 'Step%ows%' then 'INS' when message like 'Sort%' then 'SORT' when message like 'Hash%' then 'HASH' when message like '%Scan%' then 'SCAN' else 'XXX' end TYPE, sum(sofar), sum(totalwork) tw, trunc(sum(SOFAR)/((max(elapsed_seconds))+2)) O_ps, trunc(sum(SOFAR)/((max(elapsed_seconds)/60)+2),2) O_PM, trunc((sum(sofar)/(sum(totalwork)+1))*100,2) prc, max( elapsed_seconds) el_sec, trunc((max(elapsed_seconds)/60)) as min_run, min(s.inst_id) MN_in,max(s.inst_id) MX_in, count(distinct s.inst_id) inst_cnt, count(1) ,substr(message,1,instr(message,' ')) Tmsg from gv$session_longops u join gv$session s on (u.sid=s.sid and u.inst_id=s.inst_id and u.serial#=s.serial#) where 1=1 /*and u.sofar <> u.totalwork*/ and (message like '%Insert%:%' or message like 'Sort%' or message like '%Scan%' or message like 'Hash%' or message like 'Step%ows%') and s.module=:MODULE and s.CLIENT_INFO=:CLIENT_INFO group by s.action, case when message like 'Insert%' or message like 'Step%ows%' then 'INS' when message like 'Sort%' then 'SORT' when message like 'Hash%' then 'HASH' when message like '%Scan%' then 'SCAN' else 'XXX' end, substr(message,1,instr(message,' ')) order by 4,7 desc -- u.inst_id,u.sid )

select sum(temp_size) MB_siz,tablespace,username,schemaname,count(*),instance from ( SELECT b.tablespace, a.module,client_info, ROUND(((b.blocks*p.value)/1024/1024),2) AS temp_size, a.inst_id as Instance, a.sid||','||a.serial# AS sid_serial, NVL(a.username, '(oracle)') AS username,schemaname, a.program, a.status, a.sql_id FROM gv$session a, gv$sort_usage b, gv$parameter p WHERE p.name = 'db_block_size' AND a.saddr = b.session_addr AND a.inst_id=b.inst_id AND a.inst_id=p.inst_id --and a.sql_hash_value=:SQL_HASH_VALUE and a.module =:MODULE and a.client_info =:CLIENT_INFO ) group by tablespace,instance,username,schemaname order by 1 desc

Select se.EVENT, se.WAIT_CLASS, sum(se.TOTAL_WAITS) TOTAL_WAITS, sum(se.TOTAL_TIMEOUTS) TOTAL_TIMEOUTS, sum(se.TIME_WAITED) TIME_WAITED, round(avg(se.AVERAGE_WAIT),3) AVERAGE_WAIT, max(se.MAX_WAIT) MAX_WAIT, sum(se.TIME_WAITED_MICRO) TIME_WAITED_MICRO FROM gv$session_event se, gv$session a Where a.inst_id=se.inst_id AND a.sid=se.sid and a.module =:MODULE and a.client_info =:CLIENT_INFO GROUP BY se.EVENT,se.WAIT_CLASS order by 5 desc

select name,sum(value) value from gv$sesstat a join v$statname b on (a.statistic#=b.statistic#) join gv$session se on (a.inst_id=se.inst_id AND a.sid=se.sid) where 1=1 and se.module =:MODULE and se.client_info =:CLIENT_INFO group by name order by 2 desc

select * from (select s.inst_id,s.sid,s.serial# SERIAL,s.program,s.module, s.event,s.SQL_ID,s.machine,s.osuser,s.logon_time ,trunc((sysdate- s.SQL_EXEC_START)*24*60,2) Mins_Exec ,trunc((sysdate-s.logon_time)*24*60,2) Mins_Logon ,s.seconds_in_wait /*,t.sql_text*/ ,s.P1, s.P1Text, s.P2, s.P2Text, s.P3, s.P3Text , s.username,s.schemaname , s.service_name , action,client_info , s.blocking_instance , s.blocking_session , s.final_blocking_instance , s.final_blocking_session ,s.sql_hash_value , 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''|| SID || ',' || s.SERIAL# || ', @' || s.INST_ID || ''';' Kill ,s.status from gv$session s where 1=1 and s.module =:MODULE and s.client_info =:CLIENT_INFO ) order by case when status='ACTIVE' then 1 else 0 end desc, mins_exec desc nulls last, mins_logon desc nulls last

select s.inst_id, (s.cpu_time/1000000) "CPU_Seconds", s.disk_reads "Disk_Reads", s.buffer_gets "Buffer_Gets", s.executions "Executions", case when s.rows_processed = 0 then null else round((s.buffer_gets/nvl(replace(s.rows_processed,0,1),1))) end "Buffer_gets/rows_proc", round((s.buffer_gets/nvl(replace(s.executions,0,1),1))) "Buffer_gets/executions", (s.elapsed_time/1000000) "Elapsed_Seconds", substr(s.sql_text,1,500) "SQL", s.module "Module", s.sql_id from gv$sql s where 1=1 and s.module =:MODULE and s.sql_id=:SQL_ID

select s.action, message, case when message like 'Insert%' or message like 'Step%ows%' then 'INS' when message like 'Sort%' then 'SORT' when message like 'Hash%' then 'HASH' when message like '%Scan%' then 'SCAN' else 'XXX' end TYPE, sofar, totalwork, trunc((SOFAR)/(((elapsed_seconds))+2)) O_ps, trunc((SOFAR)/(((elapsed_seconds)/60)+2),2) O_PM, trunc(((sofar)/((totalwork)+1))*100,2) prc, ( elapsed_seconds) el_sec, trunc(((elapsed_seconds)/60)) as min_run, (s.inst_id) MN_in,(s.inst_id) MX_in, substr(message,1,instr(message,' ')) Tmsg from gv$session_longops u join gv$session s on (u.sid=s.sid and u.inst_id=s.inst_id and u.serial#=s.serial#) where 1=1 and s.module=:MODULE and s.CLIENT_INFO=:CLIENT_INFO order by message

select trunc((sysdate-a.error_sysdate)*24*60*60,2) DT_Sec, task, DW_LOG_ID, PROCESS_NAME, substr(a.MESSAGE,1,3000), --MESSAGE, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_SYSDATE, dw_sid,dw_inst_id, ID_1, ID_2, ID_3, ID_4, a.DW_TASK_ID, a.DW_RUN_ID, a.DW_RANGE_VALUE_ID, a.DW_STEP_ID, a.DW_BATCH_ID from dw_rt_log_app a left outer join dw_tasks b on (a.dw_task_id=b.dw_task_id) where 1=1 and error_sysdate>sysdate-0.1 and a.dw_task_id=:DW_TASK_ID and a.DW_RUN_ID=:DW_RUN_ID and a.dw_range_value_id =:DW_RANGE_VALUE_ID order by error_sysdate desc , DW_LOG_ID desc

select trunc((sysdate-a.error_sysdate)*24*60*60,2) DT_Sec, task, DW_LOG_ID, PROCESS_NAME, substr(a.MESSAGE,1,3000), --MESSAGE, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_SYSDATE, dw_sid,dw_inst_id, ID_1, ID_2, ID_3, ID_4, a.DW_TASK_ID, a.DW_RUN_ID, a.DW_RANGE_VALUE_ID, a.DW_STEP_ID, a.DW_BATCH_ID from dw_rt_log_app a left outer join dw_tasks b on (a.dw_task_id=b.dw_task_id) where 1=1 and error_sysdate>sysdate-0.1 --and a.dw_task_id=:DW_TASK_ID and a.DW_RUN_ID=:DW_RUN_ID order by error_sysdate desc , DW_LOG_ID desc
select * from dw_tasks where dw_task_id=:DW_TASK_ID
select * from dw_task_exec_steps where task in (select pattern_task from dw_tasks where dw_task_id=:DW_TASK_ID union select task from dw_tasks where dw_task_id=:DW_TASK_ID) order by task,step_order
select a.* from umd_source_specific_rules a , dw_tasks b where b.dw_task_id= :DW_TASK_ID and source_system_rule_cd like TASK||'%' order by source_system_rule_cd,rule_seq

select * from ( select c.dw_date_key src_dtk,coalesce(to_char(b.dw_date_key) ,a.diy_parameter,'_') my_dtk,a.run_status,task,rows_loaded , max_key nr_fls, a.dw_batch_id, a.diy_parameter, dw_run_id, trunc((nvl(case when run_status='RUNNING' then sysdate else end_date end ,sysdate)- start_date)*24*60,1) mins, trunc(rows_loaded/(trunc((nvl(end_date,sysdate)-start_date)*24*60*60,1)+0.000000001),1) RpSecs, start_date,end_date, min_process_ts,max_process_ts, case when run_status in ('RUNNING','CLOSED1','FAILED') then direct_exec_sql else null end direct_exec_sql, --a.direct_exec_sql, a.dw_task_id, rows_error ,t.task_business_area ,substr(REMARK,1,1000) sids --a.* from dw_rt_runs a left outer join (select dw_task_id t_id,task_business_area,pattern_task from dw_tasks ) t on a.dw_task_id=t.t_id left outer join dw_rt_batches b on a.dw_batch_id=b.dw_batch_id left outer join dw_rt_batches c on b.dw_copied_batch_id=c.dw_batch_id where 1=1 and run_status in ('CLOSED','SUCCESS','RUNNING','RUNABLE','FAILED','PENDING') and a.dw_task_id=:DW_TASK_ID order by case when run_status='RUNNING' then 1 when run_status in ('FAILED','WAITING','PENDING') then 2 when run_status='RUNABLE' then 3 else 4 end, --2 desc , start_date desc ) where 1=1

select to_number(b.col1_max) mv ,b.range_value_description RV , trunc((nvl(case when run_status='RUNNING' then sysdate else end_date end ,sysdate)- start_date)*24*60,1) mins ,a.dw_run_id,a.DW_RANGE_VALUE_ID, a.START_DATE, a.END_DATE, a.ROWS_LOADED, a.ROWS_ERROR, a.RUN_STATUS , case when run_status in('RUNNING','FAILED') then a.DIRECT_EXEC_SQL else null end d_sql --, a.direct_exec_sql from dw_rt_range_runs a join dw_range_values b on (a.dw_range_value_id=b.dw_range_value_id) where dw_run_id = :DW_RUN_ID order by dw_run_id, case when a.run_status in ('RUNNING','FAILED') then 1 when a.run_status='SUCCESS' then 2 else 3 end, end_date desc, 1

select sysdate,ld_dt,sum(nr_runs) nr_runs, trunc( sum(rows_loaded)/1000000,2) MilRows from (select * from dw_tasks where DW_TASK_ID=:DW_TASK_ID ) a left join (select r.dw_task_id, to_char(end_date,'YYYYMMDD') ld_dt, count(1) nr_runs , sum(r.rows_loaded) as rows_loaded from dw_rt_runs r join dw_rt_batches b on (r.dw_batch_id = b.dw_batch_id) where run_status in ('SUCCESS','CLOSED') and R.DW_TASK_ID=:DW_TASK_ID and (nvl(r.end_date,sysdate) > trunc(sysdate-35)) -- Change to sysdate-1 if you only want the last 24 hrs and (nvl(r.end_date,sysdate) < trunc(sysdate+1)) -- Change to sysdate-1 if you only want the last 24 hrs group by r.dw_task_id, to_char(end_date,'YYYYMMDD') ) x on (a.dw_task_id=x.dw_task_id) where 1=1 group by ld_dt order by ld_dt desc

select a.btt,b.* from ( select dw_batch_id, '1-MINE:' btt from dw_rt_runs where dw_run_id=:DW_RUN_ID union select dw_copied_batch_id,'2-COPY:' from dw_rt_batches where dw_batch_id in (select dw_batch_id from dw_rt_runs where dw_run_id=:DW_RUN_ID) union select dw_batch_id, '3-SB_MEM:' from dw_rt_batches where dw_super_batch_id in ( select dw_copied_batch_id from dw_rt_batches where dw_batch_id in (select dw_batch_id from dw_rt_runs where dw_run_id=:DW_RUN_ID) ) ) a join dw_rt_batches b on b.dw_batch_id=a.dw_batch_id order by 1,2
select u.* from gv$lock u join gv$session s on (u.sid=s.sid and u.inst_id=s.inst_id ) where 1=1 and s.module=:MODULE and s.CLIENT_INFO=:CLIENT_INFO and u.type='UL'
select * from dw_bib_clob_log where create_dt > trunc(sysdate)-0.2 and dw_run_id=:DW_RUN_ID order by create_dt desc

SELECT s.sid, s.serial#, s.username, s.program, t.used_ublk Undo_Blocks, t.used_urec Undo_Records FROM gv$session s, gv$transaction t WHERE s.inst_id = t.inst_id and s.taddr = t.addr and s.module =:MODULE and s.client_info =:CLIENT_INFO ORDER BY 5 desc, 6 desc, 1, 2, 3, 4
